entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
